altername_name: La Vie d'Emma: Mon refuge pour Animaux
name: Pet Adoption Center
overview: Care for and help find new homes for all the animals at Sunflower Pet Adoption Center. Nestled in a large, one-of-a-kind outdoor facility, it's the perfect mix of outdoor and indoor pet accommodations. As the manager of the center, you will take care of a variety of loveable pets, including cats, dogs, bunnies, hamsters, guinea pigs, and even baby horses and deer. While the game was sold as a Toys“R”Us -exclusive, it was sold in other countries as My Pet Shelter & Emily: My Animal Shelter.
